readability-string-compare.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
StringLikeClasses
A string containing semicolon-separated names of string-like classes.
By default contains only
::std::basic_string
and
::std::basic_string_view
. If a class from this list has
a
compare
method similar to that of
std::string
, it will be checked
in the same way.
Example
struct
CustomString
{
public
:
int
compare
(
const
CustomString
&
other
)
const
;
}
CustomString
str1
;
CustomString
str2
;
// use str1 != str2 instead.
if
(
str1
.
compare
(
str2
))
{
}
If
StringLikeClasses
contains
CustomString
, the check will suggest
replacing
compare
with equality operator.
